Verses: 1 ummai En Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Thudhippen; Dhevargalukku Munbaaga Ummaik Keerththanampannuven.

2 umadhu Parisuththa Aalayaththirku Neraaga Naan Panindhu Umadhu Kirubaiyinimiththamum Umadhu Unmaiyinimiththamum Umadhu Naamaththaith Thudhippen; Umadhu Sagala Pirasdhaabaththaip Paarkkilum Umadhu Vaarththaiyai Neer Magimaippaduththiyirukkireer.
3 naan Kooppitta Naalile Enakku Maruuththaravu Arulineer; En Aaththumaavile Belan Thandhu Ennaith Dhairiyappaduththineer;
4 karththaave, Boomiyin Raajaakkalellaarum Umadhu Vaayin Vaarththaigalaik Ketkumpodhu Ummaith Thudhippaargal.
5 karththarin Magimai Peridhaayiruppadhinaal, Avargal Karththarin Vazhigalaip Paaduvaargal.
6 karththar Uyarndhavaraayirundhum, Thaazhmaiyullavanai Nokkip Paarkkiraar; Mettimaiyaanavanaiyo Dhooraththilirundhu Arigiraar.
7 naan Thunbaththin Naduvil Nadandhaalum Neer Ennai Uyirppippeer; En Saththurukkalin Kobaththukku Virodhamaaga Umadhu Kaiyai Neettuveer; Umadhu Valadhukaram Ennai Ratchikkum.
8 karththar Enakkaaga Yaavaiyum Seydhu Mudippaar; Karththaave, Umadhu Kirubai Endrumulladhu; Umadhu Karaththin Kiriyaigalai Negizhavidaadhiruppeeraaga.
